resources.string:
About program 


 The program is designed to display bitcoin blockchain data from various sources.
 On the main page data about BTC rate receive from coindesk. 
 Data about RUB rate received from site https://www.cbr-xml-daily.ru 
 Data about ETH rate received from coinbase 
 
 On Summary report page all data received from blockchain.info 
 
 Developer: Chelbukhov Aleksey 
 2018
